page.title: 16CHILD'S DAY IN BENINGTON (1)
page.content:
A Study of a Boy's Sunday Dominic Elmes (11yrs) eatherfield House, Benington. Father is part family owner/director of Elmes Ltd. Builders Merchants,Stevenage One Brother and two Sisters. Pets: A Dog, two Rabbits, one Mouse. Large House. Five Bedrooms, Five Bath- rooms, Games Room, Indoor Swimming Pool etc. standing in Six Acres. Two Cars: Daimler & Escort XR 31.
07.00 hr. Got up and went downstairs in pyjamas. Watched T.V. in the Lounge on my own. Nothing of interest on. 07.30 hr. Returned upstairs and got dressed, wearing underpants, jeans, T- Shirt, Socks and Trainers. 07.45 hr.Went back downstairs to kitch- en. Got own Breakfast: Cornflakes with milk & sugar, and drink of Orange Juice (Cont.)
